column2: I dropped by with a couple of friends for a quick snack and drinks. We sat at the only bar table and ordered some nigiri pieces
column4: and some drinks. Lesson learned is that it gets crowded here on Saturday starting at happy hour 5 PM and the bartender will easily forget about you so if you need extra attention
column5: don't sit at the bar table. Beyond that
column6: drinks and food were excellent as always.
